title: Minions
body:
I main jg kayn. He does well when ganking but he is really bad at maneuvering around minions. It would be nice in the next patch that either that kayn's e can go through minions or champions can go through their team's minions because this happened to everyone.
It would  nice if someone took this to consider because I die sometimes because I'm trapped my minions and then the enemy kills me.
Thanks
P.S. I would like a roiter to answer and tell me if this is posible.
